name: Introduction to React Native
description: Learn the basics of React Native development and build your first mobile app.

syllabus.content: Overview of React Native, setting up your development environment.
Creating a simple mobile app using React Native components

name: Advanced React Native Techniques
description: Dive deeper into React Native with advanced techniques and best practices.

syllabus.content: Explore advanced component patterns and composition techniques.
Optimizing React Native apps for performance and responsiveness.

name: React Native App Development Bootcamp
description: Intensive bootcamp to master React Native app development from scratch.
prerequisites: No prior React Native experience required

syllabus.content: Installing necessary tools and configuring your environment for React Native.
Designing and implementing user interfaces with React Native components.

name: Full Stack Web & Mobile Development with React Native
description: Comprehensive course covering both front-end web development and mobile app development with React Native.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
No prior React Native experience required

syllabus.content: Introduction to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for web development.
Overview of React Native and its advantages for mobile app development.

name: React Native UI Design Masterclass
description: Focused course on mastering UI design principles and practices in React Native.

syllabus.content: Understanding the basics of user interface design and its importance.
Exploring typography and color theory in UI design.

name: React Native for Beginners: A Hands-On Approach
description: Beginner-friendly course focusing on practical exercises to learn React Native.
prerequisites: No prior React Native experience required

syllabus.content: Setting up your development environment and creating your first React Native app.
Understanding React Native components and their usage.
